feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:42 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 02:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.8°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
